thread.section_title: The Wall Street Journal & Breaking News, Business, Financial and Economic News, World News and Video
thread.title: Retailers Post Strong Numbers — And Mall Shares Keep Falling

author: Esther Fung
title: Retailers Post Strong Numbers — And Mall Shares Keep Falling
text:
Mall landlords can’t win. On a day when two major department stores posted stronger-than-expected sales numbers, shares of mall REITs still tumbled.
The culprit? Worries about rising interest rates.
Shares of mall real-estate investment trusts usually trade up or down whenever a major retailer discusses its results or the broader retailing...
